scripts.html: npx fse move --quiet ./index.html ./preserve/index.html && npx fse copy ./template/main.html ./index.html
scripts.ignorePreserve: echo-cli \n# Preserve main repo data and HJSON/YAML files\npreserve/ >> .gitignore
scripts.prepare:hjson: npm run html && npm run ignorePreserve && npx fse copy ./template/_metadata.hjson ./_metadata.hjson
scripts.prepare:yaml: npm run html && npm run ignorePreserve && npx fse copy ./template/_metadata.yaml ./_metadata.yaml
scripts.preserve: npx fse move --quiet ./_metadata.hjson ./preserve/_metadata.hjson && npx fse move --quiet ./_metadata.yaml ./preserve/_metadata.yaml
scripts.serve: npm run preserve && npm run validate && npm run lint
